FuncDef: Thepriority-mbs-thresholdscommand contains the root arbiter parent policer smin-thresh-separationcommand and each priority level smbs-contributioncommand that is used to internally derive each priority level s shared-portion and fair-portion values. The system uses each priority level s shared-portion and fair-portion value to calculate each priority level s discard-unfair and discard-all MBS thresholds that enforce priority sensitive rate-based discards within the root arbiter s parent policer.
